lv.lumii.layoutengine

Interface Connectible

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Box, Diagram, Line

    public interface Connectible
    Specifies elements that can be connected to a line, and the methods common to such elements.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Line connectTo(Connectible element, Line.LineType lineType, double spacing)
      Adds a line to this diagram.
      Line connectTo(Connectible element, Line.LineType lineType, double spacing, java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double> points)
      Adds a line to this diagram going along the given points.
      Line connectTo(Connectible element, Line.LineType lineType, double spacing, java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double> points, boolean cleanup)
      Adds a line to this diagram going along the given points.
      java.util.ArrayList<Line> getIncidentLines()
      Returns a list of all lines incident to this element.

    • Method Detail

      • connectTo

        Line connectTo(Connectible element,
               Line.LineType lineType,
               double spacing)
        Adds a line to this diagram. A line can connect boxes or other lines. The whole diagram is reordered afterwards, or at the end of the current transaction.
        Parameters:
        element - the element to connect to this Connectible
        lineType - the type of the new line
        spacing - the width of the empty buffer around the line
        Returns:
        the new line connecting this Connectible with the given element.

      • connectTo

        Line connectTo(Connectible element,
               Line.LineType lineType,
               double spacing,
               java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double> points)
        Adds a line to this diagram going along the given points. A line can connect boxes or other lines. The whole diagram is reordered afterwards, or at the end of the current transaction.
        Parameters:
        element - the element to connect to this Connectible
        lineType - the type of the new line
        spacing - the width of the empty buffer around the line
        points - the desired vertices of the new line
        Returns:
        the new line connecting this Connectible with the given element.

      • connectTo

        Line connectTo(Connectible element,
               Line.LineType lineType,
               double spacing,
               java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double> points,
               boolean cleanup)
        Adds a line to this diagram going along the given points. A line can connect boxes or other lines. The whole diagram is reordered afterwards, or at the end of the current transaction.
        Parameters:
        element - the element to connect to this Connectible
        lineType - the type of the new line
        spacing - the width of the empty buffer around the line
        points - the desired vertices of the new line
        cleanup - whether to clean up the given line, removing unnecessary corners
        Returns:
        the new line connecting this Connectible with the given element.

      • getIncidentLines

        java.util.ArrayList<Line> getIncidentLines()
        Returns a list of all lines incident to this element.
        Returns:
        a list of all lines incident to this element.
